name: Weight Loss & Fitness
description: Practical guidance for weight loss and fitness with simple steps

copy.en: Weight loss begins with a calorie deficit. Eat about 500 fewer calories than your maintenance level each day. Track meals with an app and choose whole, nutrient-dense foods. Partner with a friend for accountability to create sustainable habits and lasting progress.

A daily walk improves fitness and supports weight loss. Aim for thirty minutes at a brisk pace. Use a step counter to stay consistent and increase distance weekly. Walk with a friend for motivation and enjoy steady calorie burn and better mood each day.
